gov.nasa.jpl.iondtn.gui

Interface OnIonStatusChangeListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BabRuleFragment, BcbRuleFragment, BibRuleFragment, ConfigurationFragment, ConfigurationListFragment, ContactFragment, EndpointFragment, InductFragment, KeyFragment, OutductFragment, ProtocolFragment, RangeFragment, SchemeFragment, StatusFragment

    public interface OnIonStatusChangeListener
    ION status change listener interface. Allows callback registering to get notified when ION-DTN changes occur

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Notifies that the ION-DTN status has changed
      void onServiceAvailable()
      Notifies that the NodeAdministrationService is now available
